name: Celia's Lightmare LD45
description:
Find the light, use it to fight. Find the wand and destroy nightmare fiends in this third person arena shooter.
Sacrifice your souls to gain multipliers each run, and see how long you can last in the Lightmare.

Controls:

*WASD- Movement
*Mouse - Aim

*Left Click - Fire

*F - Sacrifice souls and reset (when prompted)
*ESC-Exit


Programmed by AJ Jones and Nick Cadieux

Project Managed by AJ Jones

Concept art by Taylor Reynolds

Character Design & Animation by Taylor Reynolds

Music & SFX by Chris Purse

Additional Modeling by Carsen Kelliher and David Daniel Reynolds

Writing by Rebecca Rost
